channel.title: Irrigations on Pooya Shirazi
channel.description: Recent content in Irrigations on Pooya Shirazi

item.title: CROPWAT Project
item.description: 01. CropWat CROPWAT is a decision support tool developed by the Land and Water Development Division of FAO. CROPWAT 8.0 for Windows is a computer program for the calculation of crop water requirements and irrigation requirements based on soil, climate and crop data. In addition, the program allows the development of irrigation schedules for different management conditions and the calculation of scheme water supply for varying crop patterns. CROPWAT 8.

item.title: Session 09
item.description: Reference Sample Report To write an appropirate report, we are suggesting to use the Sample Report file. Each team should submit their report in “PDF” or “Word Document”. How Your Report Score Is Calculated? Your final score for a report is the sum of the scores for all of the report parts: Report Score Session 09 Presentation This is the Power Point of the ninth session.
